name: Favicon Fetcher (Redis)
description: A high-performance service to fetch, cache, and serve favicons. (Production Ready)

NODE_ENV.description: Sets the application environment to production.

REDIS_URL.description: The connection URL for the Redis instance. This is automatically provisioned by the Heroku Redis add-on.

LIMIT_SEPARATOR.description: The character used to separate multiple rate limit rules. Defaults to comma.

REQ_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Milliseconds to wait for target sites.

HTML_PAYLOAD_LIMIT.description: Max HTML size to download in bytes.

ICON_PAYLOAD_LIMIT.description: Max icon file size to download in bytes.

AUTHN0.description: Example API key. Create AUTHN1, AUTHN2, etc. for more keys.

LIMIT0.description: Example rate limit for the corresponding API key (AUTHN0).

LIMITA.description: Global rate limit for all anonymous users.

LIMITI.description: Per-IP rate limit for anonymous users. Applied in addition to LIMITA.
